The fontanelle
On the top of your babyâ€™s head, 
near the front, is a diamond-
shaped patch where the skull 
bones have not yet fused 
together. This is called the 
fontanelle. It will probably be a 
year or more before the bones 
close over. You may notice the 
fontanelle moving as your baby 
breathe
